akas: Yukon Men - Überleben in Alaska Germany
akas from release info: Yukon Men - Überleben in Alaska Germany

1.title: Tanana's Last Stand
1.plot: The largest wildfire in Alaskan history torches the land surrounding Tanana and threatens to devour the village. With state resources spread thin, the villagers must band together to battle the blaze or risk losing everything.

2.title: From the Ashes
2.plot: After Alaska's largest wildfire ravages Tanana, the villagers must adapt their subsistence lifestyles to a new even harsher reality. Two young homesteaders embark upon a dangerous journey in the hopes of starting a new life on the Cosna.

3.title: No Man's Land
3.plot: After the devastating fire, villagers must modify traditional techniques if they are to survive the winter. A young couple arrives at their remote homestead to discover a life more challenging than they ever imagined.

4.title: Desperate Measures
4.plot: Rebuilding after the fire set everyone back. Charlie needs all his native wisdom to supply his family this winter. Pat Moore gambles big, trading a prize sled dog for a handful of goats. Stan needs James' lumber to help rebuild his cabin.

5.title: Drive to Survive
5.plot: With a brutal winter taking hold, Chris and Jessi struggle to stay warm. In Rampart,Charlie digs deep into his bag of tricks. Stan and Joey build a monster truck to help rebuild Tozi cabin.

6.title: The Yukon Way
6.plot: Realities of a harsh winter set in. Charlie and James rush to save a home thatslid into a creek. Pat's last hope for meat is in jeopardy. Racing to rebuild the survival cabin means going where no man has gone before.

7.title: The Edge
7.plot: Winter is here. The reality of the "dark days" takes hold. Chris and Jessi struggle for each meal and need a new strategy. Putting the village first, Charlie falls behind on his own preparations. For Pat, it's time to find out if his gamble will pay off.

8.title: Final Shot
8.plot: As the dark days descend, villagers scramble to make final preparations. Desperate for meat, the Morses come nose to nose with a bear. Stan makes a mad dash for his winter home on the Tozi. Charlie Wright answers an emergency call from a village elder.

1.title: Hunt or Starve
1.plot: The village of Tanana is low on meat. Stan Zuray and his son, Joey, are forced to take a deadly journey into the Yukon Mountains to hunt for caribou. Meanwhile, Charlie Wright must face the threat of a lone wolf that is terrorizing the town.

2.title: The Race for Fur
2.plot: With only three weeks left in trapping season, our men race to collect their most valuable commodity--fur. A brutal winter has made the animals scarce. The men are up against the clock to trap as much fur as possible before the season is over.

3.title: Going for Broke
3.plot: It's the end of trapping season and the final push is on. Charlie and Bob rush to the river before it melts in hopes of snaring some beaver. Stan and Joe visit Tosi cabin to trap their fur on land. However, they face a larger problem... a bear.

4.title: On Thin Ice
4.plot: It's goose-hunting season and the people of Tanana are stocking up on food. Stan & Joey race to get first goose and Charlie & Bob have a father-son contest. Meanwhile, the rivers they use to travel are melting fast... Not everyone will make it home.

5.title: Tragic Spring
5.plot: The rivers around Tanana are dangerously melting. Most hunters have made the deadly journey back home but Charlie's brother-in-law, George, is missing. Search & rescue efforts are unsuccessful. A town of 200 people has to face a shocking reality.

6.title: Man Up, Move Out
6.plot: It's finally spring in Tanana and Joey Zuray is ready to move out on his own. The only thing he has to do is move the house he wants across town, before it gets demolished in a few days. Charlie hunts a deadly black bear that's menacing the village.

7.title: Logjam
7.plot: Its driftwood logging season, and there's a brief window to pull firewood out of local rivers. James relies on his young son to help make ends meet. Stan gets caught in a powerful storm and Charlie battles a deadly black bear.

8.title: Wheel of Misfortune
8.plot: Salmon is a precious food source, and the people of Tanana only have a few days to stock up for the winter. Stan Zuray and Pat Moore race to get fish wheels in the water to feed their dog teams, while Charlie sets nets to catch fish for his family.

9.title: Last Chance
9.plot: The villagers of Tanana have just 18 hours to get a year's worth of king salmon. Joey and Bob find themselves in the midst of a dangerous hunt. Courtney takes it upon herself to help feed her family, and vicious grizzlies are stealing food.

0.title: On the Brink
0.plot: Join the cast of the hit show Yukon Men for an exclusive sneak peek at an epic new season. Check out never-before-seen footage, get new insight into all of last year's heart-pounding action, and see what new challenges await the villagers of Tanana.

1.title: Feast or Famine
1.plot: Stan nearly loses his winter's supply of fish during a risky maneuver on the river. Charlie is in danger of letting precious meat slip away. Courtney tries to bring down her first moose, and James battles a deadly virus outbreak among his dog team.

2.title: New Kid in Town
2.plot: Moose hunting season is almost over, and Bob and Charlie are desperate for a moose. Joey and Francis team up to make the most of the hunt. Stan Zuray's sled dog needs emergency surgery, and The Moore's new dog handler struggles to make it in Tanana.

3.title: Hell Freezes Over
3.plot: It's winter in Tanana and villagers race to prepare for the brutal season before the freezing ice and snow engulfs the town. As the pressure to make it rises, tempers flare and father-son conflicts put lives in danger.

4.title: Tough Choices
4.plot: It's trapping season in Tanana and villagers battle deadly cold to get fur. Joey starts his own line, and ends up in trouble. Charlie and Bob chase a vicious wolverine that's been stealing their bait, and the Moores make a decision about newcomer Dustin.

5.title: Fresh Blood
5.plot: Trapping season is underway, but record-low snowfall has made fur scarce and villagers are forced to adapt. A deadly wolverine threatens the Moores' fish camp. Charlie and Bob go after a bear in its den.

6.title: Pray for Snow
6.plot: Lack of snow is making trails impassable. Joey sets a new trap line that brings him face to face with a vicious predator. Charlie trusts Bob to run his traps, but Bob might not be up to the challenge. James struggles with a wood shortage.

7.title: Eeling and Dealing
7.plot: The Moores gamble on catching eels as a new source of food for their dogs; Stan and Joe hunt moose in their last chance to get meat before the dead of winter; Charlie and Bob work around the clock to save their dismal season.

8.title: Dead of Winter
8.plot: The dead of winter is here and Stan has been on the hunt for over a week without results. Charlie's freezer is empty but a town crisis prevents him from hunting. Courtney is missing in action and Francis destroys James' snow machine.

9.title: No Quarter
9.plot: Watch the ALL NEW season of Yukon Men Sundays at 9PM E/P. Stan risks his life in hazardous whiteout conditions. Charlie uses tough love on Bob, will it push him away from subsistence living?

10.title: Turf War
10.plot: After the worst storm in ten years, Tanana residents emerge to see what's left of their village. Charlie needs help defending his trapline from the Moores, but his son, Bob, is missing in action. Stan receives an unexpected visit from the lower 48s.

11.title: Wolf Invasion
11.plot: The annual dog sled race is the biggest event in the village. The Moores look to defend their crown, but James looks to take it away and take over the dog breeding business. Charlie and Stan band together to keep everyone safe from a vicious wolf pack.

12.title: Deadly Crossing
12.plot: A late-season cold snap grips Tanana. James finds a creative way to save his business and teach his son, Francis, a lesson. Stan faces the deadly Tozi River crossing without Joey. The Moores turn to an outsider for help, and face the shock of a lifetime.

13.title: Rite of Spring
13.plot: It's goose-hunting season. Conflict between Stan and Joey leads them to a rite of passage. A confrontation looms after Bob fails to meet his responsibilities with Charlie. James goes hunting on deadly grounds. Pat must put his trust in newcomer, Sean.

14.title: River Rising
14.plot: Spring brings predators to Tanana, and Stan loses a sled dogs to a hungry bear. The Yukon River begins to thaw at an alarming rate, and the villagers must quickly move to high ground. The town gas pump breaks, putting a halt to flood preparations.

15.title: Aftermath
15.plot: As floodwaters surge threatening the village, valuable driftwood is left flowing in the wake. James takes to the river to stock-up but his own son, turns his back on him. Joey also races up river but ends up stranded. Pat hires a helper from New Zealand.

16.title: Season of Change
16.plot: Pat is faced with tough financial choices when he finds out his newly handicapped wife is returning home. Sensing weakness, James strategizes to bring Pat's kennel down. Stan is forced to make a life changing decision. Bob finally decides to leave Tanana.

1.title: Breaking Points
1.plot: Change is coming for the Yukon Men. A government ban on a staple food source sends the Yukon Men to extremes. The village is visited by the Governor of Alaska, who bears news that will change the town and it's people forever.

2.title: Day of Reckoning
2.plot: A double homicide rocks the small Alaskan town of Tanana. Pat is forced to make a difficult decision. Joey builds a raft for an epic trip to float a 3-ton truck 150 miles downriver. Meanwhile, Charlie gets devastating news about his son Bob.

3.title: The Longest Day
3.plot: Joey floats a massive truck on a primitive log raft for 150 miles down the deadly Yukon River. Stan finds himself stranded. Pat is surprised by his nephew's return to Tanana. Charlie and James go moose hunting to supply food for a traditional ceremony.

4.title: Rising Sons
4.plot: Charlie's livelihood is challenged when the son of a Tanana legend lays claim to his trap line. Joey and Bob embark on a bow and arrow hunt to secure food for the town elders. James leaves his young sons in the wilderness in the ultimate frontier test.

5.title: New Blood
5.plot: Stan gets a surprise visit from an old friend and the reunion sparks opportunity for a dangerous and risky mining operation. Courtney helps a former villager re-acclimate to life in Tanana. Charlie tests his son Bob's recovery with an epic hunt.

6.title: Mother vs. Nature
6.plot: Villagers unite when bears descend on Tanana. Courtney risks her life to protect her family while Joey and others protect the town from a group of bears. Meanwhile, Charlie races to fix the water plant and Stan gambles on a mining project.

7.title: Stan's Gamble
7.plot: Stan's mining gamble demands that he resurrect a 70-year-old tractor. Without it, the mission will fail. Charlie and Joey are put to the test when they have to endure the most challenging hunt of their lives. Pat Moore's son, Thomas, returns home.

8.title: Winter Takes All
8.plot: Unseasonably thin ice prevents villagers from reaching valuable hunting grounds, forcing Stan and Charlie to carve a new path through the rugged Alaskan wilderness in search of food. Desperate to provide for his family, James takes a huge risk.

1.title: The Dark Days
1.plot: The Yukon Men are enduring through what is known as the dark days. Residents team up to keep a large wolf pack at bay. The Moore family must choose a leader for their dog-mushing team. Joey honors his grandmother by hosting a traditional dinner for her.

2.title: The Black Wolf
2.plot: A wolf pack continues to encroach. Charlie's only option is to pursue the pack leader. Joey deals with consequences of Alaska's unusually warm winter and turns to his dad for help. Nations thinks the Moore's mushing team is running with the wrong leader.

3.title: On Thin Ice
3.plot: Stan has the dangerous task of building an ice road across the Yukon River. Joe and Bob take their chances to embark on a perilous caribou hunt. Charlie confronts Nations about his trapline neglect. Pat and Courtney are faced with an alarming discovery.

4.title: Gut Check
4.plot: The pressure is on Nations, when the Moores head out for the first major dog sled race of the season. Stan faces a hard decision when one of his dogs falls ill. Charlie has had enough once he sees the state of the trapline he handed over to Nations.

5.title: Tanana's Test
5.plot: Stan and Pat race to prepare Tanana to be a checkpoint for the Iditarod dog sled race. Charlie and Bob hunt a grizzly that has been terrorizing a miner's camp. Joe trains his new dog, hoping to turn him into a hunting partner.

6.title: Life on the Line
6.plot: Nations and Charlie have a confrontation over rights to a family trapline. Stan and Kathleen try to upgrade Tozi cabin, but get more than they bargained for. The Moore's kennel is on the line as Courtney and Nations race in the Yukon River Championship.

7.title: Blood on Their Hands
7.plot: After a poor trapping season, Charlie Wright teams up with Stan Zuray in a last-ditch effort to catch beaver. Stan and Joe Zuray discover a large predator has been stealing from their trapline. James Roberts teaches his two sons the importance of hunting.

8.title: All In
8.plot: Unseasonably thin ice prevents villagers from reaching valuable hunting grounds, forcing Stan and Charlie to carve a new path through the rugged Alaskan wilderness in search of food. Desperate to provide for his family, James takes a huge risk.

9.title: Breaking Point
9.plot: A historic lack of snowfall prevents Stan Zuray from reaching his trapline. Charlie Wright joins forces with Stan to defend an ancestral trapline from an unknown invader. Courtney Agnes passes on dying native traditions to her daughter Cuppie.

imdb.plot outline: Follow the men of Tanana, a remote village in Alaska by the Yukon River, on their everyday life throughout the four seasons. Every second counts, because as winter is getting closer and the days are getting shorter, they only have so much time to gather enough supplies to last through months of total darkness and extreme coldness. They will have to hunt, fish and trap to survive, and there is always a new problem to encounter with every task. Some will have to fight for their lives, while others will have to protect what's theirs from the wilderness.
imdb.title: Yukon Men
plot: Follow the men of Tanana, a remote village in Alaska by the Yukon River, on their everyday life throughout the four seasons. Every second counts, because as winter is getting closer and the days are getting shorter, they only have so much time to gather enough supplies to last through months of total darkness and extreme coldness. They will have to hunt, fish and trap to survive, and there is always a new problem to encounter with every task. Some will have to fight for their lives, while others will have to protect what's theirs from the wilderness.

The men of Tanana have to work hard to hunt and fish to live a hunter/gatherer lifestyle for their families. They work individually and together in this small town of 200 so everyone is cared for. You don't see them any closer than when one family is in need; for whatever reason. This shows the ups and downs of a small isolated town in the middle of the harsh wilderness of Alaska.
